questions.question: The Abstract Factory Pattern promotes the creation of consistent object families.
The Abstract Factory Pattern ensures compatibility between objects within a family.
The Abstract Factory Pattern allows for easy interchangeability of entire families of objects.
The Abstract Factory Pattern is particularly useful when the system needs to be independent of how its objects are created, composed, and represented.
The Abstract Factory Pattern involves creating abstract classes for object creation, with each abstract class representing a family of related objects.
